commitMessage:
@@@[FLINK-16753][checkpointing] Use CheckpointException to wrap exceptions thrown from AsyncCheckpointRunnable

This closes #11509.

@@@[FLINK-18662][task] Introduce CheckpointMetricsBuilder

This will later allow to solve in a hopefully elegant way the issue.  that
some checkpoint metrics are calculated after AsyncCheckpointRunnable's construction.
CheckpointMetricsBuilder will be able to collect those additional metrics via CompletableFuture's
while CheckpointMetrics class will remain a serializable class used in the RPC.
@@@[FLINK-20675][checkpointing] Only decline async checkpoint failure when task is still running
@@@[FLINK-20675][checkpointing] Refactor interfaces to decline checkpoint with CheckpointException

@@@[FLINK-21215][task] Do not overwrite the original CheckpointFailureReason in AsyncCheckpointRunnable

Before this change.  original failure reason would be hidden and replaced with CHECKPOINT_ASYNC_EXCEPTION
@@@[FLINK-21084][runtime][checkpoint] Task reports finished snapshot on checkpoint if it is finished on restore
